indicator_name: 약물사용장애 치료개입(약물치료, 심리사회적 재활 및 사후 관리 서비스) 보장범위
target_name: 마약 및 해로운 알코올을 포함하여 약물남용 예방 및 치료 강화

en.title: Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders
en.indicator_name: Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders
en.target: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
